title: "The Human-power Behind AI: Machine Learning Needs Annotators"
excerpt: "Behind the rapid growth of the AI industry, the new profession of data annotator is also expanding. There is a popular saying in the data annotation industry, “more intelligent, more labors”. The data that AI algorithms learn from must be annotated one by one through the human annotators."
